name: flask_project
description: Welcome ------- Hello. Want to get started with Flask quickly? Good. You came to the right place. This Flask application framework is pre-configured with Flask-SQLAlchemy, Flask-WTF, and the Twitter Bootstrap frontend (among others). This will get your Flask app up and running on Heroku or PythonAnywhere quickly. Use this starter, boilerplate for all you new Flask projects. Cheers!
